project.name: sabbus
project.description: SuperSabbus for Scala core, builds the scala library and compiler. It can also package it as a simple distribution, tests it for stable bootstrapping and against the Scala test suite.

target.name: build
target.description: Builds the Scala compiler and library. Executables are in 'build/pack/bin'.

target.name: build-opt
target.description: Builds the optimised Scala compiler and library. Executables are in 'build/pack/bin'.

target.name: clean
target.description: Removes binaries of compiler and library. Distributions are untouched.

target.name: test
target.description: Runs test suite and bootstrapping test on Scala compiler and library.

target.name: test-opt
target.description: Runs test suite and bootstrapping test, everything is optimised (compiler, library, tests).

target.name: docs
target.description: Builds documentation for the Scala library. Scaladoc is in 'build/scaladoc/library'.

target.name: docscomp
target.description: Builds documentation for the Scala compiler and library. Scaladoc is in 'build/scaladoc'.

target.name: docsclean
target.description: Removes generated documentation. Distributions are untouched.

target.name: dist
target.description: Makes a new distribution and tests it. Will remove existing binaries and documentation.

target.name: dist-opt
target.description: Makes a new optimised distribution and tests it. Will remove existing binaries and documentation.

target.name: partialdist
target.description: Makes a new distribution without documentation, so just for testing.

target.name: partialdist-opt
target.description: Makes a new optimised distribution without testing it or removing partially build elements.

target.name: fastdist
target.description: Makes a new distribution without testing it or removing partially build elements.

target.name: fastdist-opt
target.description: Makes a new optimised distribution without testing it or removing partially build elements.

target.name: distclean
target.description: Removes all distributions. Binaries and documentation are untouched.

target.name: replacestarr
target.description: Replaces the Starr compiler and library by fresh ones built from current sources and tests them.

fail.message: This target is not available on Windows. Use 'ant replacestarrwin' instead.

target.name: replacestarr-opt
target.description: Replaces the Starr compiler and library by fresh, optimised ones built from current sources and tests them.

target.name: replacestarrwin
target.description: Creates a new Starr on Windows. Manually execute 'ant locker.clean build' first!

fail.message: This target is only available on Windows. Use 'ant replacestarr' instead.

echo.message: CAUTION: Make sure to execute 'ant locker.clean build' prior to calling 'replacestarrwin'.

target.name: replacestarrwin-opt
target.description: Creates a new Starr on Windows. Manually execute 'ant locker.clean build' first!

target.name: replacelocker
target.description: Replaces the Locker compiler and library by fresh ones built from current sources.

target.name: replacelocker-opt
target.description: Replaces the Locker compiler and library by fresh, optimised ones built from current sources.

target.name: unlocklocker
target.description: Unlocks Locker, allowing its compiler and library to be rebuilt

target.name: fastlocker.lib
target.description: Buildlocker without extra fuss

target.name: fastlocker.reflect
target.description: Buildlocker without extra fuss

target.name: fastlocker.comp
target.description: Buildlocker without extra fuss

target.name: fastlocker
target.description: Buildlocker without extra fuss

target.name: buildlocker
target.description: Does the same for locker as build does for quick

echo.message: Updating bootstrap libs. (To do this by hand, run ./pull-binary-libs.sh)

fail.message: JDK ${ant.java.version} is not supported by this build!

target.name: init.warn.jdk7
target.echo: You are using JDK7 for this build. While this will be able to build most of Scala, it will not build the Swing project. You will be unable to create a distribution.

target.name: init
target.depends: init.jars, init.maven.jars, init.version.done, init.fail.bad.jdk, init.warn.jdk7, init.extra.tasks

echo.message: Scaladoc will point to ${scaladoc.url} for source files.

target.name: docs.all
target.depends: docs.jline, docs.comp, docs.man, docs.lib, docs.scalap, docs.partest, docs.continuations-plugin

target.name: distpack-opt
target.description: Builds an optimised distribution.

target.name: distpack-maven-opt
target.description: Builds an optimised maven distribution.
